General.Name: Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc
General.Description: Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of display screen integrated circuits (ICs) and power management ICs in Taiwan. It offers LCD driver, LED driver, and E paper display driver ICs; and power management IC products comprising EPD Panel Power, Switching Regulator, motor driver IC, USB power switch IC, reset IC, Li-on charger IC, low dropout regulator, and integrated power management IC products. The company's products are used for various applications consisting of consumer, Internet of Things, automotive, communications, and industrial and commercial markets. Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
